      • sendMail

        public void sendMail(int contentType,
                     java.lang.String toAddressString,
                     java.lang.String theSubject,
                     java.lang.String theContent,
                     boolean doBlindCopy,
                     boolean async)
              throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Send a HTML-only email message to the specified recipient, with the specified subject and HTML content.
        Parameters:
        contentType - Content Type of the email
        toAddressString - TO: address
        theSubject - the subject line
        theContent - the body of the email
        doBlindCopy - if true add the defined Blind Copy address, if false do not.
        async - set to true to send the mail asynchronously or false to send it synchronously
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception

        public void sendMail(int contentType,
                     java.lang.String toAddressString,
                     java.lang.String theSubject,

                     boolean deleteAttachmentAfterSend,
                     boolean async)
              throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Send a HTML-only email message to the specified recipient, with the specified subject and HTML content.
        Parameters:
        contentType - Content Type of the email
        toAddressString - TO: address
        theSubject - the subject line
        theContent - the body of the email
        fullAttachmentFilename - full filename of the attachment
        friendlyAttachmentName - friendly name to use for the attachment
        deleteAttachmentAfterSend - set to true to delete the attachment file after the send
        doBlindCopy - if true add the defined Blind Copy address, if false do not.
        async - set to true to send the mail asynchronously or false to send it synchronously
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception

      • sendText

        public void sendText(java.lang.String toAddressString,
                     java.lang.String fromAddressString,
                     java.lang.String replyToAddressString,
                     java.lang.String theSubject,
                     java.lang.String theContentText,
                     boolean doBlindCopy,
                     java.lang.String bccEmails,
                     boolean async)
              throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Send a text-only email message to the specified recipient and from address, with the specified subject and text content.
        Specified by:
        sendText in interface EmailMgrIf
        Parameters:
        toAddressString - TO: address
        fromAddressString - From address - if null the store default is used
        replyToAddressString - Reply To address - if null the store default is used
        theSubject - the subject line
        theContentText - the plain text body of the mail
        bccEmails - Semicolon separated list of blind copy email addresses.
        doBlindCopy - if true add the defined Blind Copy address, if false do not.
        async - set to true to send the mail asynchronously or false to send it synchronously
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception

      • sendText

        public void sendText(java.lang.String toAddressString,
                     java.lang.String theSubject,
                     java.lang.String theContentText,
                     boolean doBlindCopy,
                     java.lang.String fullAttachmentFilename,
                     java.lang.String friendlyAttachmentName,
                     boolean deleteAttachmentAfterSend,
                     java.lang.String bccEmails,
                     boolean async)
              throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Send a text-only email message to the specified recipient, with the specified subject, text content and attachment options.
        Parameters:
        toAddressString - TO: address
        theSubject - the subject line
        theContentText - the plain text body of the mail
        doBlindCopy - if true add the defined Blind Copy address, if false do not.
        fullAttachmentFilename - full filename of the attachment
        friendlyAttachmentName - friendly name to use for the attachment
        deleteAttachmentAfterSend - set to true to delete the attachment file after the send
        bccEmails - Semicolon separated list of blind copy email addresses.
        async - set to true to send the mail asynchronously or false to send it synchronously
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException - an unexpected KKException exception

      • isEmailValid

        Specified by:
        isEmailValid in interface EmailMgrIf
        Parameters:
        emailAddr - the emailAddr
        Returns:
        Returns true if the email address is valid. Otherwise returns false.

      • sendExternalMail

        protected boolean sendExternalMail(org.apache.velocity.VelocityContext context,
                                   java.lang.String konakartAPI,
                                   java.lang.String emailAddr,
                                   EmailTemplate emailTemplate,
                                   EmailOptionsIf options)
        If an external mail module has been defined and it is active then it is called to send the mail
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        konakartAPI - the konakartAPI
        emailAddr - the emailAddr
        emailTemplate - the emailTemplate
        options - the options
        Returns:
        Returns true if the email was sent, false if not. If an exception occurs this will return false
